header.title: It takes 7 seconds to make a good impression
header.text: I design and code beautiful simple things, and I love what I do.

about_page.design_text: I create design products with unique ideas.
about_page.development_text: I develop Front-end with super smooth coding.
about_page.title: Hello, I'm Laura Janssens
about_page.subtitle: Design is not just what it looks like. Design is how it works!
about_page.text_one: I have proceeded my dream to be a web designer and developer as it has been my lifelong ambition. I am a junior Front-end developer with a UI/UX design background. I had a 1 year amazing expierce at Take The Lead were I learned so much. Now I'm looking for the next oppurtunity to improve an show-off my skills.
about_page.text_two: I am a team player, focused, resistant to stress and constantly challenging my skills.
